body:
# **What it is?**

A recipe app made with Javascript using also Babel and Webpack. User can search for a recipe, add the products to the shopping list and change quantities. User can also add favorites recipes to see later. It's a tutorial that will be refactored and become a full project incorporating a budget app and recipe app in one



## What I learned?

* Async and awai
* Babel
* Webpack
* Arrays methods
* Algorithms

## Links

* [Project page](https://frosty-gates-971964.netlify.app/#29057)
* [GitHub page](https://github.com/mugas/Recipesapp)
title: Shopping Recipe App
author: Ricardo Moreira
